Items.Name: Sverull ElektroDynamo AB
Items.Description:
Sverull ElektroDynamo är en ledande aktör inom industriservice och 
produktförsäljning med spetskompetens inom elektromekanik, lager, 
transmissioner, tätningar samt samt pneumatik och automation. De erbjuder hela 
kedjan från analys, projektering och produktleverans till montage, underhåll 
och reparationer. För att kunna erbjuda snabb och professionell support finns 
verksamheten på ett flertal orter i Sverige med lokala serviceverkstäder och 
lokal lagerhållning. Allt detta för att säkerställa en så effektiv och 
driftsäker produktion som möjligt för dig som kund. 

Sverull ElektroDynamo är ett framgångsrikt resultat av fusionen mellan Sverull 
och ElektroDynamo som genomfördes för att ytterligare stärka sin position på 
marknaden och erbjuda ett än mer attraktivt utbud av servicetjänster och 
industrikomponenter. Företaget förenar specialistkompetens med tekniska 
lösningar och som helhetsleverantör gör de det enkelt för dig vid inköp, 
transport och lagerhållning. Dessutom garanteras din tillgång till service, 
support och utbildning

ABB 제품및 부품들을 공급해드리고 있으며, 고객 요구의 신속한 대처를 위해 항상 전력을 다하고 있습니다.

T.G. Control Co., Ltd. is a perfessional energy conservation company, 
who has comprehensive expertise in advanced energy Efficiency technologies. We 
can supply various energy conservation equipments to almost all industries such 
as metallurgy, iron & steel, petrochemical, street lighting, plastic,

Items.Name: Tannlin Technology
Items.Description: It began with the design and manufacture of the world’s first stencil laser cutting system - since then Tannlin’s capabilities have expanded, encompassing customised laser cutting systems, high accuracy laser processing and electronic assembly support products. Tannlin’s ability to bring innovative solutions to the market for its customers can be attributed to continuous investment in research and development. Through taking advantage of emerging laser and motion technology, our aim is to create and maintain an environment and culture which promotes innovative design and production.

Items.Name: Tara Robotik Otomasyon ve Makina Imalat San. A.S.
Items.Description: TARA Robotic Automation is an engineering company that serves robotic solutions to its customers and also it is able to modify the standardised systems in terms of the customer's needs and production methods. TARA minimizes risk of projects and creates most profitable solutions with best price favorable by using standart and flexible robotic systems designed by TARA. TARA Robotic Automation choosed the way that being an expert on specific areas instead of knowing a little about different areas so, TARA Robotic is an enginnering company that only works on robotic machine loading application, robotic packaging and palletizing applications, creating production lines.

Items.Name: Tebulo Industrial Robotics B.V.
Items.Description:
Tebulo Industrial Robotics is the leading and innovative specialist in high-tech robot integration. We work closely with major players in steel, aluminum and heavy industry.

With our specific expertise in R&D, engineering, assembly and commissioning, we build and maintain high-quality integrated robot applications.
 
Our expert and multidisciplinary teams pleasantly surprise you with their approach, advice, realization, service and aftersales.

With our flexible and high-tech solutions, you are assured of a significant improvement in safety and productivity. This allows you to capture and / or maintain a leading position in your market.

In addition, we offer sufficient support during the entire life cycle and we offer tailor-made solutions for automation problems for non-robot installations.

Sustainability and high delivery reliability are self-evident.

We are an ambitious and motivated employer and offer our team a challenging work environment with room for personal input and development. Our team consists exclusively of qualified and customer-oriented professionals who strive for the best result.

Taking responsibility and constantly improving is in their DNA.

Items.Name: Tech.Pa. S.p.A.
Items.Description:
TECH.PA. is focused mainly in robotics and vision system, in process and packaging applications for F&B, Home Care, Personal Care and Cosmetics markets.

The other sector are:

Programming P.L.C. and Motion Control 
Monitoring systems
Electrical panels and wiring on the machine
Customer Service

Since 2010, TECH.PA. has been authorized to design, implement and certify the 
frameworks UL cULus - File: E209624 for the North American and Canadian 
markets.

Transline Engineers Pvt Ltd
Items.Description: TRANSLINE ENGINEERS (P) LIMITED

Items.Name: Trimaster Oy
Items.Description:
Trimaster is specialized in different packaging processes within the food and health care industry. Trimaster supplies turn key solutions to customers by utilizing more than 20 years of experience in material handling. Typical applications are picking & packing, case loading and palletising solutions and also conveyor systems for product transportation.

Trimaster is part of global Multivac Group which has more than 50 years of packaging competence and therefore Trimaster / Multivac is one stop supplier for packaging processes.

MULTIVAC is one of the worldwide leading providers of packaging solutions used to pack a range of products including; food products, life science and health care products, and industrial goods.

Our product portfolio covers nearly all the needs of the customer and includes - in addition to different packaging machines – marking and inspection, labelling and quality inspection systems, robot automation and product transportation systems and turnkey production lines.

Our customers benefit from our profound knowledge of processes and systems and from an integrated advisory service all from one source.

Items.Name: TsentrElektroMontazh OOO
Items.Description:
ООО «ЦентрЭлектроМонтаж» работает на рынке электроснабжения Воронежа и 
Воронежской области с 2004 года. Мы производим полный комплекс работ в таких 
сферах, как диспетчеризация, пусконаладочные мероприятия, электромонтаж, а 
также проектирование и производство оборудования и электромонтажных изделий для 
промышленных и жилых объектов.

Для монтажа электроустановок и ремонта силового электрооборудования мы 
применяем материалы отличного качества, что позволяет гарантировать высокое 
качество выполнения всех работ. При этом мы предлагаем доступные цены на все 
услуги: от установки до ремонта.

Нам под силу выполнить любые задачи, связанные с электромонтажом. Мы используем 
сертифицированное силовое электрооборудование для электроснабжения, 
электроосвещения и т.д., соответствующее всем нормам безопасности. Наша 
компания по выгодным ценам реализует монтаж электрооборудования (частотных 
преобразователей, устройств АВР и т.д.) от ведущих производителей – Siemens, 
Schneider Electric, АВВ, Веспер. Наши сотрудники регулярно проходят повышение 
квалификации в центрах этих организаций как в Воронеже, так и в других городах.

Наши специалисты прошли обучение и имеют соответствующие сертификаты, 
подтверждающие их квалификацию по обслуживанию приводной техники.

Для обеспечения бесперебойной работы приводной техники в течении всего периода 
эксплуатации сервисный центр предлагает следующие виды услуг:
· консультация по телефону и в режиме on-line на нашем сайте;
· диагностика, гарантийный и послегарантийный ремонт приводной техники;
· сервисный визит по вызову на предприятие пользователя;
· комплексное техническое обслуживание приводной техники;
· шеф-монтаж, запуск в эксплуатацию приводной техники;
· проверку условий эксплуатации оборудования (в т.ч. анализ питающей сети) с 
предоставлением рекомендаций для увеличения эффективности и уменьшения 
вероятности отказов оборудования;
· обучение пользователей.

Срок гарантии оборудования составляет:
· ACS55, ACS150, ACS310, ACS355, ACS550, ACH550 – 24 месяца с момента ввода в 
эксплуатацию;
· ACS800, ACS880, ACS850, ACQ810, DCS550, DCS800 – 12 месяцев с момента ввода в 
эксплуатацию.

Ремонт гарантийного оборудования осуществляется в следующей последовательности:
· потребитель направляет письмо-рекламацию непосредственно Продавцу, а он в 
свою очередь в российское представительство компании производителя.
· определяется место выполнения работ

Items.Name: TSR Solutions LLC
Items.Description: TSR Solutions is a leading provider of engineering smaller scale automationand techninical services worldwide.  We are a diverse company offering expertise in project management, engineering, techincal writing and machine building.  We focus on key strategic alliances to collectively provide services and solutions to meet our clients' needs. We use our vast base of expert resources to offer innovative and cost effective solutions to the market.  In a fast paced world with high demand for limited resources, TSR Solutions offers clear robust solutions made possible with understanding, innovation and ingenuity.

Address.StreetAddress: No.168 Guang'anmenwai Street, Langqin International Block B, Xicheng District

Items.Name: UBT Xinguang Technology (Beijing) Co Ltd
Items.Description:
Union Bright Technology (Beijing) Limited was registered in Beijing in September 2011, and its affiliate company, Union Bright Technology Limited, was registered in Hong Kong in March 2003. The same person stands as the legal representative of the two companies.
UBT is a channel partner of the main engine plants of ABB pneumatic actuators relying on its favorable partnership with major power groups. As a partner, it takes full charge of the promotion, sales and after-sales of the products, and has been rated as an excellent distributor by the ABB Group for three consecutive years. Our acting KENT imported regulating valve is equipped with an ABB intelligent positioner. Besides, we have scored achievements in promoting ABB pneumatic actuators in the three main engine plants, five major power generation groups, Shenhua Group, etc.
On account of the close cooperation with the ABB Group, our after-sales staff are experienced in technical support and after-sales service, and key talents are qualified with 10+ years of technical expertise. They are competent at installation, commissioning, troubleshooting and maintenance, and are 24 hours available on site at your call.

Items.Name: Unimak Makina San Ve Tic AS
Items.Description: Unimak specialize in the design, engineering and manufacture of tailor made machinery & equipment for the sanitary ceramic industry. The company set up complete sanitary ware plants as turnkey projects. They provide solutions for other fields in the ceramic industry, along with filtration technologies, material handling solutions and stone splitting equipment.

Address.StreetAddress: C/ Islandia 182, Nave 24 A - Poligono Industrial Tecnocordoba

Items.Name: Union Tecnologica Del Sur SL
Items.Description:
Unión Tecnológica del Sur, SL es una empresa joven pero con una fuerte proyección de futuro.

Nos dedicamos a la distribución de todo tipo de suministros industriales y material eléctrico y electrónico, destacando que nuestra tarea no es solo vender, sino aconsejar, asesorar y ver qué es lo más eficiente para el cliente.

Entre nuestros profesionales contamos un equipo técnico-comercial capaz de atender con la máxima proximidad a los clientes, intentando conseguir en todo momento una buena relación calidad-precio y un servicio rápido y eficaz.

Además disponemos del apoyo de un departamento de ingeniería para completar todo tipo de soluciones técnicas y montajes que nuestros clientes precisen.

La principal intención de nuestra Compañía es dar un buen servicio a nuestros clientes; no olvide que "nuestro objetivo es su tranquilidad".

Items.Name: United Robotics Inc
Items.Description:
Although founded in 2014, United Robotics has over 75 years of combined industrial automation experience.  URI offers robot automation solutions for many market segments such as arc welding, robotic vision, spot welding, material handling, sorting, plasma cutting, and machine tending applications.  We offer a full line of products and services including robot system selection, fixture or tooling design, weld demonstrations, training with a CWI, field 
service, preventative maintenance, robotic programming and training, process engineering consultation, weld engineering, virtual robot simulations, and automation controls. United Robotics strives to partner with America's manufacturers to increase throughput, repeatability and quality
 
Our new automation technology center, located in Springdale, Arkansas contains a 1,000 square foot demo lab and equipment showroom, 8,000 square feet of assembly area, and a training center employing the latest in virtual training technology.  Combining the virtual classroom environment with hands-on practical experience insures that our customers receive the level of training 
necessary to take ownership of their automation purchase.

Items.Name: UNIVERSAL DIRECT DIGITAL CONTROL Co Ltd
Items.Description: 宇博數控股份有限公司(Universal Direct Digital Control Co., Ltd.)是專業於運動控制系統、油壓節能系統以及機電整合控制之自動化集成公司。目前經銷伺服控制器、運動控制器等控制元件。提供以ABB低壓變頻器為核心的飛剪追剪控制、射出機節能、橡塑膠機械等技術。

Items.Name: V.R. Traders
Items.Description:
V R Traders is one of the Largest Firm providing Industrial Motors & Drives with Prompt Service assurance to its customers through all over India. 

With the Wide Experience of 30 Years, we have retained our Customer Satisfaction through timely fulfillment of Commitments & Post Sales Services.

We are amongst Western Region’s leading Stockiest / Distributors / Channel partner of ABB Ltd.

Items.Name: VAE Prosys s.r.o.
Items.Description:
Company is oriented for selling and technical support of programmable 
controllers and low-voltage devices of ABB company. 

We are partner of ABB in distribution of programmable controllers, AC/DC drives 
products and all range of low-voltage devices and devices for automation. 

Sale and distribution of programmable controllers and low-voltage devices is 
based on professional technical support. Our technicians provide to our 
customer technical support in all phases of realization. 

Company is accredited training centre for ABB Procontic system and ABB Advant® 
Controller 31 system for all Europe. Several hundred Czech and foreign 
customers who use programmable controllers were trained in our centre.

Items.Name: Van Bodegraven Elektromotoren B.V.
Items.Description:
Level of Ex repair authorization: LV Ex 2 max. IEC 450 frame size, Exd(e), Exe, 
ExnA and Ext protection modes.

Items.Name: Van Meer Industrial Services B.V.
Items.Description:
Van Meer Industrial Services biedt een totale dienstverlening op gebied van 
Rotating equipment, Drives en Field services. Dit omvat de volledige life-cycle 
van elektrische en mechanische installaties bestaande uit engineering, 
implementatie, onderhoud, verbetering en vervanging. Om dit te garanderen staat 
de juiste kennis en expertise centraal, waarbij flexibiliteit, betrokkenheid, 
efficiënte en effectiviteit moeten worden gegarandeerd. Van Meer Industrial 
Services investeert dan ook continue in de opleiding van haar service engineers 
en wil up-to-date blijven met de noodzakelijke certificeringen om werkzaamheden 
op een correcte en veilige manier uit te voeren.

De dienstverlening die Van Meer Industrial Services verzorgt is steeds op maat 
en wordt afgestemd met de klant, waarbij sterk aandacht wordt gegeven aan 
communicatie, planning, procedures, kwaliteit, gezondheid, veiligheid, milieu 
en feedback.

De doelstelling van Van Meer Industrial Services gaat bij elke project uit van 
een lange termijn relatie, waarin de klant de ondersteuning moet krijgen naar 
een correcte advisering, oplossingsgericht meedenken en het verlagen van de 
Total Cost of Ownership binnen onderhoudsdivisies.

VisiConsult X-ray Systems & Solutions GmbH
Items.Description:
The specialist for customized X-ray inspection solutions and automation

VisiConsult is a family owned company located in Northern Germany and known as 
the leading supplier for customized and standard X-ray inspection systems. To 
ensure a premium quality, all products are developed and produced locally as 
turnkey solutions. This leads to cutting edge technology and an unmatched 
flexibility.Our goal is to solve inspection problems with tailored systems, 
while guaranteeing a premium post-sales service. More than 25 years of 
expertise in industrial (NDT) and security applications combined with 
experienced engineers result in solutions that set new industry standards.

Automation, Electrical Distribution and Instrumentation - Volt Automation offers the right  combination of hardware, software and service solutions to power and automate your industrial facility.

Items.Name: VSM Venture Control Systems Pvt Ltd
Weingärtner GmbH Elektromaschinenbau
Items.Description:
Wir bringen Sie auf Touren

Sobald sich bei Ihnen etwas bewegt - ob mechanisch oder elektrisch - sollten 
Sie unsere Telefonnummer immer griffbereit haben. Denn wir minimieren Ihnen 
Stillstand und bringen Sie auf Touren.

Rund-um-Angebot: Wir sorgen für Fehlersuche, -analyse und -beseitigung.
Notfalldienste: Wir sind mit unserem mobilen Service für Sie 24 Stunden im 
Dienst. Wo immer Sie uns brauchen.
Servicevertrag: Wir warten regelmässig Ihre Geräte und Maschinen - damit es gar 
nicht erst zum Notfall kommt.
Verleih, Austausch, Verkauf: Alles ist möglich. Schnell ein Ersatzgerät. Oder 
ideenreich eine individuelle Lösung. Natürlich mit Kostenübersicht.

Address.StreetAddress: 4F-3, No. 83, Sec. 2, Gongdao 5th Rd., East Dist.

Items.Name: Weltall Technology Corporation
Items.Description:
Weltall Technology Corporation was established in 2007 by a group of experienced engineers. The purpose of establishment is expected to「Honesty, Justice, Diligent, Passion」attitude and spirit. We are providing real-time and good service to build customers, employees, shareholders and suppliers create win-win relationships with sharing platform. The headquarter locates in Hsinchu, Taiwan and has service centers in Hsinchu (Northern Taiwan) , Taichung (Central Taiwan) and Tainan (Southern Taiwan).
The company main products are online gas monitoring system equipment. Including AMC gas micro pollution monitor system in Cleanroom, Discharges Pipeline VOC(THC/CH4/NMHC) gas continuous monitoring system and other correlations monitors the system equipment.
Weltall is not just an equipment distributor. They are integrated system service provider and provide Various Analyzer Equipment, the monitor system plan design, the data chart controls the software, the System Conformity Test, the Scene Pipeline Construction, the System Operation Education and Training, the Periodic Maintenance and so on the post-sale service. Also, we will provide most professional and customized integration services to our customer. At the same time, they will according to customer demands and provide best solutions with other related services.
In the past few years, we are very grateful to the customers for their care and support to Weltall, enable Weltall to grow and thrive. In here, we sincerely hope that all customers and industry leaders will continue to give us more opportunities and opinions.
沃亞科技股份有限公司成立於2007年，是由一群具有多年實務經驗的工程師團隊所設立。成立的目的就是期望以「誠信、正義、勤奮、熱情」的工作態度與精神，來提供給客戶更即時、更優質的服務，以便能建構客戶、員工、股東及供應商等多贏關係及共享平台。總公司位於新竹市，並設立台中、台南客服中心，以服務北、中、南之客戶群。  
公司主要的產品為線上氣體監測系統設備，包括潔淨室AMC氣體微汙染監測系統、排放管道VOC（THC／CH4／NMHC）氣體連續監測系統及其他相關監測系統設備。  
沃亞科技不僅僅是儀器設備代理商，也是系統整合服務商，所提供的服務，包含提供各式分析儀、監測系統規劃設計、數據圖控軟體、系統整合測試、現場管線施工、系統操作教育訓練及定期保養維護等售後服務。將提供給客戶最專業及客製化的系統整合服務，同時依據客戶需求，提供最好的解決方案及相關服務。

Items.Name: Wemo Automation AB
Items.Description:
WEMO AUTOMATION GROUP is one of the leading international manufacturer of Linear-Robot-Systems and Automations cells for the plastic industry.
Wemo is today a globally supplier with a customer base of more than10,000 robot cells worldwide. Our solutions are based of Innovative solutions with 
userfreindly operations, efficience and performance of the automation equipments with long lifetime.

Address.StreetAddress: Carrs Ind Estate, Commerce Street, Haslingden

Items.Name: WH Good Automation Ltd
Items.Description:
W H Good Automation have built an excellent reputation in the delivery of process instrumentation and automation systems provided to local and international customers.

Representing ABB Measurement & Analytics across the North of England & North Wales, we pride ourselves on our collaborative approach, working with customers to find solutions to their process problems. Our in-house team of experienced engineering professionals have a wealth of technical knowledge gained on process and automation projects in many industries.

Services we offer include:
- Instrumentation assessment
Instrument configuration and documentation
- Technical support and product training
- ATEX hazardous area equipment supply and system design
- Site maintenance and calibration

We carry a large stock of PID Controllers, Recorders, pH Electrodes and Transmitters, and Pressure Transmitters, and are able to configure, deliver, install and support the broad range of instruments from ABB's portfolio & other manufacturers.

Items.Name: Winn-Marion Barber LLC
Items.Description: The Winn-Marion Companies trace their roots back to 1972 and a Georgia Tech Chemical Engineer with a vision of solving customer problems utilizing emerging technology and the idea of there always being a better way. Over the years we've grown from our base in Denver, Colorado adding eleven offices throughout the Rocky Mountain region, and expanding into Texas, Pennsylvania, Ohio and West Virginia. Winn-Marion proudly serves the industrial and semiconductor process markets with over 200 employees assisting our customers throughout the Rocky Mountain and Northeast regions of the USA.

Items.Name: Wintex Engineers
Items.Description:
Established in the year 2001, Sathguru Drives & Controls is one of the 
prominent distributors, exporters and service providers of energy saving 
equipment and automation equipment. The range of products offered by us 
comprises AC Drives, Variable Frequency Drives, Machinery Drives, and High 
Performance Machinery Drives. Further, we also provide AC Motors, ABB LV Motors 
and Equipment for varied application area. Our range is catered to numerous 
industries such as waste water treatment applications, agriculture industry, 
plastic injection molding and die-casting industry and many more.

Items.Name: WMS - engineering Werkzeuge - Maschinen - Systeme GmbH
Items.Description:
WMS-engineering GmbH is a proven expert in automation solutions. Since 1986 we 
have developed and produced everything you need for economical machining and 
assembly – whether it is an individual machine or an entire system. 
Custom-specific developments are the growing basis for our range of services. 
We will be happy to accompany you - from the initial concept to rapid 
commissioning: 
Process engineering with full responsibility and complete service - individual, 
innovative and competent.
